participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and creative, Ethan loves to explore new challenges and is always looking to push his limits.
participant_1.background: I've never been arrested, but I've had my share of run-ins with the law. I love to challenge myself physically and mentally, and I find that yoga provides the perfect opportunity for both. I have 3 dogs. I spend an hour getting ready in the morning. I spent more time with my wife and comics.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Lila is introspective and artistic, often finding solace in music and nature.
participant_2.background: I spent a lot of time last year listening to The Muggers and trying to produce music myself. I work as an interior designer. I enjoy spending time with my family as they help me stay grounded and connected to my roots. I like to take care of my body and mind, but I don't let my appearance get in the way of my passions. My favorite pastime is gazing at clouds.

content.text: Hey there! I'm interested in hearing more about your music production. What kind of music are you trying to make?
Hi there! I'm really into making electronic music, but I'm also interested in other genres like hip hop and rock.
Awesome! I've always loved electronic music. What kind of software do you use to produce your music?
I use Ableton Live, but I've also used Logic Pro and FL Studio in the past.
Ah, I've used Ableton Live before too! It's a great program.
Yeah, it's definitely one of my favorites.
What are some of your favorite artists?
I'm really into Flume, Odesza, and Tycho.
Oh, I love Flume! I've seen him live a few times. He's amazing.
Me too! I saw him at Coachella last year and it was one of the best shows I've ever seen.
Awesome! I'm jealous. I've been wanting to see him live for a while now.
He's definitely worth it. If you ever get the chance, I highly recommend seeing him.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll definitely keep an eye out for him.
